conbody.p: The <match> entries for allowing content completion for the MiramoPDF @outputclass values are located in the [oxygen_install_dir]/frameworks/dita/DITA-OT3.x/plugins/com.miramo.mmpdf/integration/oxygen/ cc_config_miramo.xml file.
Open it and copy and paste the entries inside the <config> root element in your DITA framework cc_config.xml file.
